title: Netflix Wants to Secure Warner Bros Acquisition With All-Cash Transaction
full_text: Netflix Wants to Secure Warner Bros Acquisition With All-Cash Transaction. Following multiple hostile takeover bids from Paramount, Netflix is amending its Warner Bros acquisition offering with an all-cash transaction. The post Netflix Wants to Secure Warner Bros Acquisition With All-Cash Transaction appeared first on Thurrott.com.. After Netflix announced earlier this month that it was acquiring Warner Bros. Discovery for $82.7 billion, the streaming service is now amending its acquisition offering with an all-cash transaction.… [+1347 chars]
